cmput301f13t10.model

Class SectionArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301f13t10.model.SectionArray

  • public class SectionArray
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an array of sections and contains methods to manipulate that array either through section ids or the sections themselves.
    Author:
    Braeden Soetaert

      • deleteSection

        public void deleteSection(java.lang.Integer sectionId)
        Deletes the section corresponding to the given section id. If the section id is not in the list of sections, it is not deleted.
        Parameters:
        sectionId -

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf(int id)
            throws SectionNotFoundException
        Get the index of a given section in the adventures list of sections
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the section to find
        Returns:
        The index of the section
        Throws:
        SectionNotFoundException - if the section does not exist.

      • getSection

        public SectionModel getSection(java.lang.Integer sectionId)
        Get the specified section by id.
        Parameters:
        sectionId - The id of the section to return
        Returns:
        The specified section, or null if it does not exist.

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf(SectionModel section)
            throws SectionNotFoundException
        Find the index of a section in the adventure, as determined by the section's id.
        Parameters:
        section - The section to find.
        Returns:
        The index of the section, if it exists in the adventure. -1 if it does not.
        Throws:
        SectionNotFoundException

      • addSection

        public void addSection(SectionModel section,
              AdventureModel adventureModel)
        Add a section to the current list of sections
        Parameters:
        section - The section to add

      • getStartSection

        public SectionModel getStartSection()
        Get the section that the adventure will start on
        Returns:
        The start section of the adventure

      • setSection

        public void setSection(SectionModel section)
        Set one section in the adventure. If the section does not exist, it is added to the end. Otherwise, the section is overwritten.
        Parameters:
        section - The section to write
